attributes.action: stop wasting taxpayers money fighting the lost battle against so called illegal drugs being used by anybody and everybody in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every country on the planet has acknowledged that they have lost the battle against the drug runners.  Now is the time to try the only thing which has not yet been tried.  LEGALISE ALL CURRENTLY ILLEGAL DRUGS and stop wasting my taxes on paying futile anti-drug agencies to continue fighting a lost battle.
